# This file was generated by the YaTool build system (https://github.com/yandex/yatool),
# from a source YaTool build configuration provided in ya.make files.
#
# If the repository supports both CMake and ya build configurations, please modify both of them.
#
# If only CMake build configuration is supported then modify only CMake files and note that only
# simple modifications are allowed like adding source-files to targets or adding simple properties
# like target_include_directories. These modifications will be ported to original ya.make files
# by maintainers. Any complex modifications which can't be easily ported back to the ya build
# system may be rejected.
#
# Please refer to the build instructions in the repository for more information about manual
# changes in this file.

find_package(Python3 REQUIRED)

get_built_tool_path(
  TOOL_cpp_styleguide_bin
  TOOL_cpp_styleguide_dependency
  contrib/tools/protoc/plugins/cpp_styleguide
  cpp_styleguide
)

get_built_tool_path(
  TOOL_protoc_bin
  TOOL_protoc_dependency
  contrib/tools/protoc/bin
  protoc
)

set(ANTLR_PACKAGE_NAME NSQLv1Generated)

add_library(proto_ast-gen-v1_proto_split)


target_include_directories(proto_ast-gen-v1_proto_split PUBLIC
  ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/yql/essentials/parser/proto_ast/gen/v1_proto_split/org/antlr/codegen/templates/protobuf
)

target_link_libraries(proto_ast-gen-v1_proto_split PUBLIC
  contrib-libs-linux-headers
  contrib-libs-cxxsupp
  yutil
  contrib-libs-protobuf
)

target_sources(proto_ast-gen-v1_proto_split PRIVATE
  ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/yql/essentials/parser/proto_ast/gen/v1_proto_split/SQLv1Parser.pb.code0.cc
  ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/yql/essentials/parser/proto_ast/gen/v1_proto_split/SQLv1Parser.pb.code1.cc
  ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/yql/essentials/parser/proto_ast/gen/v1_proto_split/SQLv1Parser.pb.code2.cc

  ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/yql/essentials/parser/proto_ast/gen/v1_proto_split/SQLv1Parser.pb.code4.cc
  ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/yql/essentials/parser/proto_ast/gen/v1_proto_split/SQLv1Parser.pb.code5.cc
  ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/yql/essentials/parser/proto_ast/gen/v1_proto_split/SQLv1Parser.pb.code6.cc
  ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/yql/essentials/parser/proto_ast/gen/v1_proto_split/SQLv1Parser.pb.code7.cc
  ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/yql/essentials/parser/proto_ast/gen/v1_proto_split/SQLv1Parser.pb.code8.cc
  ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/yql/essentials/parser/proto_ast/gen/v1_proto_split/SQLv1Parser.pb.code9.cc
  ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/yql/essentials/parser/proto_ast/gen/v1_proto_split/SQLv1Parser.pb.data.cc
  ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/yql/essentials/parser/proto_ast/gen/v1_proto_split/org/antlr/codegen/templates/protobuf/protobuf.stg
  ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/yql/essentials/parser/proto_ast/gen/v1_proto_split/SQLv1Parser.pb.classes.h
  ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/yql/essentials/parser/proto_ast/gen/v1_proto_split/SQLv1Parser.pb.main.h
)


configure_file(
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yql/essentials/parser/proto_ast/org/antlr/codegen/templates/protobuf/protobuf.stg.in
  ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/yql/essentials/parser/proto_ast/gen/v1_proto_split/org/antlr/codegen/templates/protobuf/protobuf.stg
)

run_antlr(
  OUTPUT
  ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/yql/essentials/parser/proto_ast/gen/v1_proto_split/SQLv1Parser.proto
  WORKING_DIRECTORY
  ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/yql/essentials/parser/proto_ast/gen/v1_proto_split
  ANTLER_ARGS
  ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/yql/essentials/parser/proto_ast/gen/v1_proto_split/SQLv1.g
  -lib
  .
  -fo
  ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/yql/essentials/parser/proto_ast/gen/v1_proto_split
  -language
  protobuf
)

add_custom_command(
  OUTPUT
  ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/yql/essentials/parser/proto_ast/gen/v1_proto_split/SQLv1Parser.pb.h
  ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/yql/essentials/parser/proto_ast/gen/v1_proto_split/SQLv1Parser.pb.cc
  DEPENDS
  ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/yql/essentials/parser/proto_ast/gen/v1_proto_split/SQLv1Parser.proto
  ${TOOL_protoc_bin}
  ${TOOL_cpp_styleguide_bin}
  WORKING_DIRECTORY
  ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/yql/essentials/parser/proto_ast/gen/v1_proto_split
  COMMAND
  ${TOOL_protoc_bin}
  -I=${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yql/essentials/parser/proto_ast/gen/v1_proto_split
  -I=${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}
  -I=${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}
  -I=${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/protobuf/src
  --cpp_out=${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}
  --cpp_styleguide_out=${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}
  --plugin=protoc-gen-cpp_styleguide=${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/contrib/tools/protoc/plugins/cpp_styleguide/cpp_styleguide
  ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/yql/essentials/parser/proto_ast/gen/v1_proto_split/SQLv1Parser.proto
)

add_custom_command(
  OUTPUT
  ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/yql/essentials/parser/proto_ast/gen/v1_proto_split/SQLv1Parser.pb.code0.cc
  ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/yql/essentials/parser/proto_ast/gen/v1_proto_split/SQLv1Parser.pb.code1.cc
  ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/yql/essentials/parser/proto_ast/gen/v1_proto_split/SQLv1Parser.pb.code2.cc
  ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/yql/essentials/parser/proto_ast/gen/v1_proto_split/SQLv1Parser.pb.code3.cc
  ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/yql/essentials/parser/proto_ast/gen/v1_proto_split/SQLv1Parser.pb.code4.cc
  ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/yql/essentials/parser/proto_ast/gen/v1_proto_split/SQLv1Parser.pb.code5.cc
  ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/yql/essentials/parser/proto_ast/gen/v1_proto_split/SQLv1Parser.pb.code6.cc
  ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/yql/essentials/parser/proto_ast/gen/v1_proto_split/SQLv1Parser.pb.code7.cc
  ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/yql/essentials/parser/proto_ast/gen/v1_proto_split/SQLv1Parser.pb.code8.cc
  ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/yql/essentials/parser/proto_ast/gen/v1_proto_split/SQLv1Parser.pb.code9.cc
  ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/yql/essentials/parser/proto_ast/gen/v1_proto_split/SQLv1Parser.pb.data.cc
  ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/yql/essentials/parser/proto_ast/gen/v1_proto_split/SQLv1Parser.pb.classes.h
  ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/yql/essentials/parser/proto_ast/gen/v1_proto_split/SQLv1Parser.pb.main.h
  DEPENDS
  ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/yql/essentials/parser/proto_ast/gen/v1_proto_split/SQLv1Parser.pb.h
  ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/yql/essentials/parser/proto_ast/gen/v1_proto_split/SQLv1Parser.pb.cc
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yql/essentials/parser/proto_ast/gen/multiproto.py
  WORKING_DIRECTORY
  ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/yql/essentials/parser/proto_ast/gen/v1_proto_split
  COMMAND
  Python3::Interpreter
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yql/essentials/parser/proto_ast/gen/multiproto.py
  SQLv1Parser
)


if(NOT CMAKE_CROSSCOMPILING)
  add_dependencies(proto_ast-gen-v1_proto_split
    protoc
    cpp_styleguide
  )
endif()
set(GRAMMAR_STRING_CORE_SINGLE "~(QUOTE_SINGLE | BACKSLASH) | (BACKSLASH .)")
set(GRAMMAR_STRING_CORE_DOUBLE "~(QUOTE_DOUBLE | BACKSLASH) | (BACKSLASH .)")
set(GRAMMAR_MULTILINE_COMMENT_CORE ".")

configure_file(
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/yql/essentials/sql/v1/SQLv1.g.in
  ${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/yql/essentials/parser/proto_ast/gen/v1_proto_split/SQLv1.g
)
